Megatron looked at Slaughter, only the side of his face that was ruined
could be seen. Meshes of wire overlapped some remaining armour. Some of
the endoskelleton structure moved, as it would when he smiled. 
"If just to please my new alliance." Megatron laughed, then looked at
Slaughter. "If you have anything valuable to say about who you once
were, say it now, before Menasor relieves you off your head." Megatron
said Bluntly.

At this Menasor understood. He brought his other hand overtop, and
closed it around Slaughter's head, a hand capable of excerting over 100
tons per square inch of pressurs, and waiting for the word. He hand
engulfed the top of Slaughter's head.
